languages.text: "О мрачных днях спрашиваешь ты, эттфатер". {n}Ульфар испускает рокочущий вздох, достает из ножен украшенный алыми рунами нож, который вы видели в его руках еще в Темном городе, и начинает вертеть в пальцах, успокаиваясь.{/n} "Пусть мой острый товарищ будет свидетелем правдивости моих слов".

"These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."
languages.original_text: "О мрачных днях спрашиваешь ты, эттфатер". {n}Ульфар испускает рокочущий вздох, достает из ножен украшенный алыми рунами нож, который вы видели в его руках еще в Темном городе, и начинает вертеть в пальцах, успокаиваясь.{/n} "Пусть мой острый товарищ будет свидетелем правдивости моих слов".

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Pregunta por días aciagos, Aett-Vater». {n}Ulfar suelta un suspiro atronador, saca el cuchillo rúnico que le viste llevar en la Ciudad Siniestra y empieza a hacerlo girar entre sus dedos, buscando el equilibrio.{/n} «Dejaré que mi afilado amigo sea testigo de la veracidad de mis palabras».
languages.original_text: "These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."

traits.locale_text: «Pregunta por días aciagos, Aett-Vater». {n}Ulfar suelta un suspiro atronador, saca el cuchillo rúnico que le viste llevar en la Ciudad Siniestra y empieza a hacerlo girar entre sus dedos, buscando el equilibrio.{/n} «Dejaré que mi afilado amigo sea testigo de la veracidad de mis palabras».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “那是一段阴暗的日子，狼领。”{n}乌尔法长叹一声，抽出了你在黑暗之城层见过的那把符文刀，在指间把玩着，重新恢复了平静。{/n}“让我这位锋利的朋友为我作证吧，我所有的话都是实话。”
languages.original_text: "These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."

traits.locale_text: “那是一段阴暗的日子，狼领。”{n}乌尔法长叹一声，抽出了你在黑暗之城层见过的那把符文刀，在指间把玩着，重新恢复了平静。{/n}“让我这位锋利的朋友为我作证吧，我所有的话都是实话。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「暗黒の日々だったよ、アエット＝ヴァテル」{n}ウルファーは音を立ててため息をつき、仄暗き都で彼が持っていたルーンの彫られたナイフを取り出した。彼は、それを指の間で回しならが、平静を取り戻した。{/n}「俺の鋭利なナイフに俺の言葉の真実性の証人になってもらおう」
languages.original_text: "These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."

traits.locale_text: 「暗黒の日々だったよ、アエット＝ヴァテル」{n}ウルファーは音を立ててため息をつき、仄暗き都で彼が持っていたルーンの彫られたナイフを取り出した。彼は、それを指の間で回しならが、平静を取り戻した。{/n}「俺の鋭利なナイフに俺の言葉の真実性の証人になってもらおう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont des jours bien sombres que vous abordez là, aett-vater. » {n}Ulfar pousse un grondement sourd, puis il sort la lame couverte de runes dont il était équipé dans la Cité Crépusculaire et se met à la faire tourner entre ses doigts comme pour se recentrer.{/n} « Que ma compagne à lame d'acier soit le témoin impartial de la véracité de mon récit. »
languages.original_text: "These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des jours bien sombres que vous abordez là, aett-vater. » {n}Ulfar pousse un grondement sourd, puis il sort la lame couverte de runes dont il était équipé dans la Cité Crépusculaire et se met à la faire tourner entre ses doigts comme pour se recentrer.{/n} « Que ma compagne à lame d'acier soit le témoin impartial de la véracité de mon récit. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Es sind dunkle Tage, nach denen Ihr fragt, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar stößt ein grollendes Seufzen aus, zieht das runenbedeckte Messer heraus, dass du in der Dunklen Stadt bei ihm gesehen hast, und dreht es zwischen seinen Fingern, um sein inneres Gleichgewicht wieder zu finden.{/n} "Lasst meinen scharfklingigen Freund Zeuge der Wahrheit meiner Worte sein."
languages.original_text: "These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."

traits.locale_text: "Es sind dunkle Tage, nach denen Ihr fragt, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar stößt ein grollendes Seufzen aus, zieht das runenbedeckte Messer heraus, dass du in der Dunklen Stadt bei ihm gesehen hast, und dreht es zwischen seinen Fingern, um sein inneres Gleichgewicht wieder zu finden.{/n} "Lasst meinen scharfklingigen Freund Zeuge der Wahrheit meiner Worte sein."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."

languages.text: "Bana kara günleri soruyorsun Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar; gür sesiyle iç çekiyor, Kara Şehir'de taşıdığını gördüğün rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak çıkarıyor ve onu parmaklarının arasında çevirerek sakinleşiyor.{/n} "Sivri dilli dostuma sözlerimin doğruluğunu kanıtlayayım."
languages.original_text: "These are dark days you are asking about, Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar lets out a rumbling sigh, draws out the rune-covered knife that you saw him carry in the Dark City, and begins to spin it between his fingers, finding his equilibrium again.{/n} "Let my keen-edged friend be a witness to the veracity of my words."

traits.locale_text: "Bana kara günleri soruyorsun Aett-Vater." {n}Ulfar gür sesiyle iç çekiyor, Kara Şehir'de taşıdığını gördüğün rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak çıkarıyor ve onu parmaklarının arasında çevirerek sakinleşiyor.{/n} "Sivri dilli dostuma sözlerimin doğruluğunu kanıtlayayım."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
